mapper.select: SELECT P.P_IMG, P.P_TITLE, P.P_PRICE, P.P_NO, P.P_CATEGORY, C.CART_COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT P , ( SELECT P_NO, CART_COUNT FROM TB_MEMCART WHERE MEM_ID= #{mem_id} ) C WHERE P.P_NO = C.P_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMCART (mem_id, p_no, cart_count) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{p_no}, #{cart_count})
